original_text: Abraham took the wood for the burnt offering and placed it on his son Isaac, and he himself carried the fire and the knife. As the two of them went on together,
korean_text: 아브라함이 이에 번제 나무를 가져다가 그의 아들 이삭에게 지우고 자기는 불과 칼을 손에 들고 두 사람이 동행하더니

sentences.original_text: Abraham took the wood for the burnt offering
and placed it on his son Isaac
sentences.korean_translation: 그것을 그의 아들 이삭에게 지우게 했으며

sentences.original_text: and he himself carried the fire
As the two of them went on together
